sentence.text: Analyses of our original miRNA expression signatures indicated that both strands of miR-144 (miR-144-5p, the passenger strand; miR-144-3p, the guide strand) showed decreased expression in cancer tissues.
Functional assays revealed that ectopic expression of miR-144-5p and miR-144-3p significantly blocked the malignant abilities of LUSQ cells, eg, cancer cell proliferation, migration, and invasion.
